thewetbandits.screens

Class InstructionsScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • thewetbandits.utils.GraphicsPane
      • thewetbandits.screens.Screen
        • thewetbandits.screens.InstructionsScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    thewetbandits.utils.Displayable, thewetbandits.utils.Interfaceable

    public class InstructionsScreen
extends Screen
    Author:
    John Thao Context displays the set of instructions for the game, it also consist of the back button to return to the MenuScreen again.
